@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Those ideas suck imo. Anyone could think those up, try to think on the original side, be creative, imaginative, go wild! Coding isn’t about making other people happy or getting up you’re “rep”, do whatever you wan’t.

item.title: Project Conker™
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Hello, My newest project is going to be Project Conker™. This thread is not for recruiting coders etc, that thread will be made soon. This thread will be for suggestions… I need some suggestions for a good server, it is based on ??? Redownloading accidently deleted lol…

////////////////Ideas//////////////////

  • New Starting Point
  • Commands
  • Shops
  • Source

Please post some ideas for the above…

//////////////////Suggestions//////////////////

////////////////// Added //////////////////

Please suggest some stuff, even server source if you want. Coders will be recruited later!

Read full topic
